name: Spellbook Sleight
author: Lieral
notes:
Cursed Seal was put in instead of Treacherous Trap Hole during Legend 3.
With a flexible engine, I felt 1 Prophecy Destroyer + 1 The Tricky in 30-card is essential, especially with Spellbook of Life within reach. Magical Something was quite handy to lock in a dumped/spent Fate or Econ. Hey, Trunade! was for the going-second approach, Cursed Seal of the Forbidden Spell for the going-first.
Side note: I couldn't help using Arkana's Restart with this deck to attach the theme to him
main29: Cursed Seal of the Forbidden Spell
